description: This file defines the interface for the Bwsp Web Servlet Object in the Broadway Web Service Plane implementation. It contains function declarations for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing web servlet objects, serving as an API header for external modules.

methods.name: BwspCreateWebServlet
methods.description: Creates a new web servlet object given container context, owner context, and reserved handle.

methods.name: BwspWsoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the web servlet object with specified contexts.

methods.name: BwspWsoRemove
methods.description: Removes the web servlet object instance.

methods.name: BwspWsoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary sub-objects or dependencies for the web servlet object.
